pages.title: Liquid Gems
pages.text: That liquid crystal you made is nice, but wouldn't it be more fun if it were more $(c_cyan)col$(c_magenta)orf$(c_yellow)ul?$()

pages.title: Liquid Moonstone
pages.text: And yes, it works with $(item)Moonstone$() too.

pages.title: Liquid Topaz (example)
pages.text: While it doesn't show it here, the fluid in the shrine becomes $(thing)liquid topaz$() (or whatever gem you use instead).

pages.title: Liquid Topaz Decrafting
pages.text: While it doesn't show it here, the fluid in the shrine reverts to $(thing)liquid crystal$().$(br2)Also serves as a way to decraft the unpolished gem blocks!
